column4: Good day all.  I just installed ubuntu 7.04 server on my Dell PowerEdge SC420 server here at home.  I cannot remember for the life of me, how to start a GUI with *nix.  I have not worked with a *nix distro in a couple of years... any pointers?  I've been googling, but not had much luck as yet... I'm still sitting at a bash prompt :)
the server version doesnt have a GUI built in you need to install it
then once installed you can do startx
